channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13448] LLAP: check ZK acls for ZKSM and fail if they are too permissive
item.description: Only the current user should have any access.
item.summary: LLAP: check ZK acls for ZKSM and fail if they are too permissive

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: The patch. Prasanth Jayachandran can you take a look
